Description: Up for auction is an AWESOME MATCHING GUITAR & AMPLIFIER SET! It's a MINT, 2009 (according to serial number E01091565) B.C. Rich Warlock electric guitar - black with Inferno Red accent, WITH a matching Inferno Red B.C. Rich guitar amplifier (with a Monster guitar cable)! Not only is a matching set like this hard to find, but as you'll see in the pictures and VIDEO (referenced below), the person who owned this set obviously DIDN'T TOUCH IT! Not only are both pieces in EXCELLENT condition, but there's no wear on anything and there's even still plastic on the electronics cavity on the back of the guitar! So we're talking about a nearly-10-year-old time capsule! Cosmetically, the guitar and amp are in excellent condition. There are a few tiny chips, which you CAN'T EVEN SEE in the pictures or in the VIDEO (referenced below) just from being moved around for about a decade. Structurally, the guitar and amp are 100%. No cracks, everything works, the neck is nice and straight, brand new strings were just put on, the amp works perfect, etc. I did notice that one fret around the 12th looks like it was filed (I'm guessing it was a raised fret or dead spot at one time), but as you'll hear in the VIDEO, all frets play and sound great. VIDEO: If you want to see EVERY ANGLE of this guitar in better detail AND you want to hear all functions of the guitar and amp tested / played, search WarlockSet12345 on YouTube and it will come right up! Whether you're just looking for a cool electric guitar and amp set, OR you're looking for a SUPER COOL GIFT for someone just starting out, THIS IS FOR YOU! And a set like this would normally be expensive to ship, but I'm offering FREE SHIPPING for the whole package! I'm letting it go at NO RESERVE so DON'T MISS OUT ON THIS ONE!
Title: B.C. Rich Warlock Electric Guitar + MATCHING AMP! (+ Video) NR + FREE SHIPPING!!
